resources.string: Amina relies on feedback from our users to provide current information that keeps everyone safe.\n\nHelp us by marking your surroundings to keep the community updated.
Sign in with your Google account to use Amina.
Let\'s start by telling us how safe you feel.
Instructional video featuring a real refugee family and graphics to advise how to prepare and store food, and ensure water for cooking and drinking is safe, when facilities are minimal or lacking.
Instructional video featuring a real refugee family and graphics to advise how to prepare and store food, and ensure water for cooking and drinking is safe, when facilities are minimal or lacking.
Instructional video featuring a real refugee family and graphics to advise how to safely keep a home-made camp shelter warm, dry and clean.
Mini-drama in which a small boy helps his pregnant mother to find ways to stay healthy.
Instructional video featuring a real refugee family and graphics to advise how to help ensure children stay safe and healthy in a camp environment.
